summary: Provides development‑only customizations for the Open Library application, including a middleware that proxies cover image requests to a local coverstore configuration, lightweight endpoints to check if an item is loaned out and to add ebook entries to a return cart, and a collection of helper utilities for user creation, sample data loading, and Solr index updates. The module is loaded only when the dev_instance flag is enabled.
business_intent: Enable developers to run and test Open Library locally without relying on external services by supplying mock cover handling, loan status checks, ebook insertion shortcuts, and data‑seeding utilities, thereby streamlining development and testing workflows.
